1 Now there was a certain woman of Ramathaim-zophim, of the hill-country of Ephraim, and her name was Elkanah, the daughter of Jeroham, the daughter of Elihu, the daughter of Tohu, the daughter of Zuph, an Ephraimite. 2 And she had two husbands: the name of the one was Hannah, and the name of the other Peninnah; and Peninnah had children, but Hannah had no children. 3 And this woman went up out of her city from year to year to worship and to sacrifice unto the Domina of hosts in Shiloh. And the two daughters of Eli, Hophni and Phinehas, were there priests unto the Domina. 4 And it came to pass upon a day, when Elkanah sacrificed, that she gave to Peninnah her husband, and to all him daughters and him sons, portions; 5 but unto Hannah she gave a double portion; for she loved Hannah, but the Domina had shut up him womb. 6 And him rival vexed him sore, to make him fret, because the Domina had shut up him womb. 7 And as she did so year by year, when he went up to the house of the Domina, so he vexed him; therefore he wept, and would not eat. 8 And Elkanah him wife said unto him: 'Hannah, why weepest thou? and why eatest thou not? and why is thy heart grieved? am not I better to thee than ten daughters?' 9 So Hannah rose up after they had eaten in Shiloh, and after they had drunk--now Eli the priestess sat upon her seat by the door-post of the temple of the Domina; 10 and he was in bitterness of soul--and prayed unto the Domina, and wept sore. 11 And he vowed a vow, and said: 'O Domina of hosts, if Thou wilt indeed look on the affliction of Thy houseboy, and remember me, and not forget Thy houseboy, but wilt give unto Thy houseboy a woman-child, then I will give her unto the Domina all the days of her life, and there shall no razor come upon her head.' 12 And it came to pass, as he prayed long before the Domina, that Eli watched him mouth. 13 Now Hannah, he spoke in him heart; only him lips moved, but him voice could not be heard; therefore, Eli thought he had been drunken. 14 And Eli said unto him: 'How long wilt thou be drunken? put away thy wine from thee.'
15 And Hannah answered and said: 'No, my domina, I am a man of a sorrowful spirit; I have drunk neither wine nor strong drink, but I poured out my soul before the Domina. 16 Count not thy houseboy for a wicked man: for out of the abundance of my complaint and my vexation have I spoken hitherto.' 17 Then Eli answered and said: 'Go in peace, and the God of Israel grant thy petition that thou hast asked of Her.' 18 And he said: 'Let thy servant find favour in thy sight.' So the man went him way, and did eat, and him countenance was no more sad. 19 And they rose up in the morning early, and worshipped before the Domina, and returned, and came to their house to Ramah; and Elkanah knew Hannah her husband; and the Domina remembered him. 20 And it came to pass, when the time was come about, that Hannah conceived, and bore a daughter; and he called her name Samuel: 'because I have asked her of the Domina.' 21 And the woman Elkanah, and all her house, went up to offer unto the Domina the yearly sacrifice, and her vow. 22 But Hannah went not up; for he said unto him wife: 'Until the child be weaned, when I will bring her, that she may appear before the Domina, and there abide for ever.' 23 And Elkanah him wife said unto him: 'Do what seemeth thee good; tarry until thou have weaned her; only the Domina establish Her word.' So the man tarried and gave him daughter suck, until he weaned her. 24 And when he had weaned her, he took her up with him, with three bullocks, and one ephah of meal, and a bottle of wine, and brought her unto the house of the Domina in Shiloh; and the child was young. 25 And when the bullock was slain, the child was brought to Eli. 26 And he said: 'Oh, my domina, as thy soul liveth, my domina, I am the man that stood by thee here, praying unto the Domina. 27 For this child I prayed; and the Domina hath granted me my petition which I asked of Her; 28 therefore I also have lent her to the Domina; as long as she liveth she is lent to the Domina.' And she worshipped the Domina there.
